Data Mishaps Night feature a lineup of data mistake stories with a focus on the human aspect of data work and lessons learned the hard way. Learn more [here](https://datamishapsnight.com/).

## When

Thursday, February 23rd at 5pm PST

::: callout-warning
This event is **not** recorded.
:::

## Where

Zoom!

::: callout-caution
You must register for **free** [here](https://datamishapsnight.com/) to receive the link!
:::

## Challenge Points (up to +8)
+ Submit to canvas a "hardy" paragraph reflection for each of the keynote and/or theme sessions you attend. 
+ Each reflection gets you +2 challenge points (that is up to +8 for the whole night!)
+ Turn in one document for all session reflections
  + Make sure to indicate with a header, which theme your reflection is for. 
  + You can write this in any document editor of your choosing (Word, Quarto, Google Docs, etc.)
